entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
